_description: John Crophill’s Loving Cups, an alewives’ poem — eight 8-line stanzas with a concluding 6-line stanza

BLHar1735.First Lines:
ffrere Tomas StanfeldeGod al megthete hem It
                    ȝelde…
BLHar1735.Last Lines:
…Scharyte most com be hendAnd ellys wyll nought be þi
                    frend
BLHar1735.Note: Folio number reflects the most recent foliation.
BLHar1735.Attributed Author:
my name is crophill (f. 49, part of the poem); quod Iohn Crophill (f.
                    49)

Digital Facsimile of British Library Harley MS 1735.

BLHar1735.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope. 
             “John Crophill’s Ale-Pots.” 
             Review of English Studies
         n.s. 20 (1969): 182-9: 188.
